function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Supply chain disruptions due to covid-19 and trade restrictions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about blockchain and its potential","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Technical challenges in scalability of blockchain-based platforms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of blockchain applications with legacy systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation and false data due to lack of transparency in blockchain-based systems for healthcare management","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g technology for real-time telemedicine consultations may lead to connectivity issues and disruptions in patient care","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on 5g technology for healthcare data collection and analysis may result in privacy and security breaches","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases may spread through the use of telemedicine platforms, such as the 5g+ teleconsultation and diagnosis platforms mentioned.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of infectious diseases through shared medical imaging devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate temperature monitoring leading to failure to detect potential covid-19 cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for cross-contamination through shared use of 5g-powered robots","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of 5g robots for covid-19 containment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deployment of 5g robots in high-traffic areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wearable iot devices for patient monitoring","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of false readings from the infrared thermometers leading to incorrect assessment of body temperatures.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g network for real-time data transmission and communication between the patrol robots and authorities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy and ethical concerns related to the use of surveillance and data collection by patrol robots.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of infrastructure to support 5g networks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective use of 5g networks in healthcare without other technologies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of established guidelines for patient data confidentiality in 5g healthcare systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of emerging technologies for covid-19 management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of covid-19 transmission mechanism and stages of spread","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global economic impact of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid global spread of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of novel infectious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manipulation of infectious disease data","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in reporting infectious disease cases due to intermediary processes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Passive reporting method leading to omission of reports","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of hacking attack on central server for infectious disease reporting system","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False information regarding infectious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of infection through face-to-face contact during delivery of diagnosis letter","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate response to infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through respiratory droplets and infectious aerosols","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic individuals spreading the virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declaration of a pandemic by who","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Widespread contagious disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread from animals to humans","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable sensor technology may provide a false sense of security, leading to decreased vigilance in following other necessary precautions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate readings from wearable sensors may lead to misdiagnosis or delayed diagnosis of diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on wearable technology for disease detection may lead to neglect of traditional diagnostic methods and clinical assessment.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validation studies for wearables have not been conducted, creating obstacles for healthcare workers regarding their clinical utility.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False-positive results from wearables create risks and require greater effort for correct interpretation of the data.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Patients are concerned with the privacy and security of their data when using wearables, as breaching of digital network security can lead to data exposure.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ehealth wearables for covid-19 data interpretation and monitoring.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilization of wearable devices in the healthcare system.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 through the handling and sharing of wearable devices","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wearable devices and unobtrusive sensing technologies may not accurately monitor early symptoms of covid-19 or common health conditions, leading to misdiagnosis or delayed treatment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Role of cloud, edge, and fog computing in telehealth monitoring systems may pose security and privacy risks for the sensitive health data transmitted and stored.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices used for maintaining social distancing and contact tracing may raise concerns about data privacy and surveillance.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wearables to monitor covid-19 symptoms may lead to inaccurate readings or interpretations, resulting in misdiagnosis or inappropriate treatment.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
